name: Office Party (amirblum)
description:
Battle of the office Conga Lines!

Employees are sad when they are not dancing. Collect them to the front of your line to grow, or steal sad employees from the back of your rival's line!

Use powerups to dance faster or make everyone in your line happy/sad.

Reach the longest line to win!

Created for Global Game Jam 2012 (theme: Ouroboros)
